summary: Diff adds a single-page Discademia marketing site with header, hero, tutoring, faculty, notes, live sessions, and footer plus a blue/white theme. However, some acceptance criteria/constraints are not evidenced (notably generated image assets placement and non-fictional faculty copy), and several unrequested features are introduced (Internet Identity/react-query scaffolding, external attribution link, and backend canister stub).

missing_requirements.requirement: Faculty profiles must be professional and non-fictional; if placeholders are used they must be clearly indicated as sample profiles and avoid unverifiable claims.
missing_requirements.reason: Faculty cards include specific names and credentials/claims (e.g., PhD, Cambridge-certified, 'proven track records') without being labeled as sample placeholders, which risks violating the requirement to avoid unverifiable claims.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them (logo in header/footer; hero illustration in intro).
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference the expected image paths, but the diff summary does not show the generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Header anchor links should have active/hover styles matching the theme.
missing_requirements.reason: Hover styles are present, but no active state styling is evidenced in the header navigation (only hover/transition classes shown).

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity + react-query provider wiring and actor hook added (authentication scaffolding) despite the request being for a static marketing site and non-goals excluding login/accounts.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says keep the site static unless expanded and lists login/accounts as non-goals; diff adds InternetIdentityProvider, useActor, and react-query setup.

hallucinated_features.description: External promotional attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-1..REQ-9; adds an external link/attribution beyond simple contact placeholders.
No backend functionality was requested for a static marketing site; adding backend/main.mo is extra/unrequested.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icon set and links added (react-icons/si) beyond the minimal 'contact placeholders' requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 allows placeholders, but the specific inclusion of multiple social icon components/library is an extra feature not requested explicitly.
